StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCommandRecruiter]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@CommandRecruiterId int)
AS
SELECT n.NWA_ID, n.rowguid AS NwaRowGuid ,SHIP_ID AS CommandRecruiterId ,COALESCE(RTRIM(p.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(p.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS Name ,COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rcrtr.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RecruiterName ,crc.CommandRecruiterCategoryId ,crc.ShortName AS CommandRecruiterCategory ,s.CurrentRankCode ,s.DateDueHome ,s.DepartureDate ,s.SHIP_DATE AS ShipDate FROM [dbo].[SHIPPER] s INNER JOIN [dbo].[CONTRACT] c ON c.CONTRACT_ID = s.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[NWA] n ON n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] mc ON mc.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = n.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] INNER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] p ON p.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] rcrtr ON rcrtr.PERSON_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN usmc.CommandRecruiterCategory crc ON crc.CommandRecruiterCategoryId = s.CommandRecruiterCategoryId WHERE s.SHIP_ID = @CommandRecruiterId
